original_text: I tried very much to please God. So I caused a lot of trouble and pain for the Christians. I obeyed the rules of God's Law, and nobody could say that I did anything wrong.
korean_text: 열심으로는 교회를 박해하고 율법의 의로는 흠이 없는 자라

sentences.original_text: I tried very much to please God.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하나님을 기쁘시게 하려고 정말 많이 노력했습니다.

sentences.original_text: So I caused a lot of trouble
I obeyed the rules of God's Law,
and nobody could say that I did anything wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 내가 잘못한 일이 있다고 말할 수 없었습니다.
